`r chunk_reveal("build")`


```{r build, include = F}
library(gapminder)
gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 2057) %>%
  ggplot() + #BREAK
  aes(y = lifeExp) + #BREAK
  aes(x = gdpPercap) +
  scale_x_log10() + #BREAK
  geom_blank() +
  annotate(geom = "text", 
           x = 300, y = 45, 
           label = "Poor and\nSick",
           size = 10,
           hjust = 0, vjust = 0,
           lineheight = .8) +
  annotate(geom = "text", 
           x = 3000, y = 80, 
           label = "Wealthy and\nHealthy",
           size = 10,
           hjust = 1, vjust = 1,
           lineheight = .8) 
  ggedit::remove_geom(last_plot(), "GeomText") + geom_blank()
  ggedit::remove_geom(last_plot(), "GeomText")  + geom_blank()
  aes(color = continent) + 
  geom_point(data = . %>% filter(continent == "Africa")) + #BREAK
  geom_point(data = . %>% filter(continent == "Americas")) + #BREAK
  geom_point(data = . %>% filter(continent == "Asia")) +  #BREAK
  geom_point(data = . %>% filter(continent == "Europe")) + #BREAK
  aes(size = pop) 
```


`r chunk_reveal("build", display_type = c("md", "code", "output"), md = talk, break_type = "user")`
